designs.name: Industrial Chic Master Bedroom
designs.description: Bold, raw luxury with exposed materials and urban sophistication
designs.flooring: Polished concrete or dark industrial wood
designs.walls: Exposed brick with matte charcoal accents
designs.ceiling: Exposed beams and metal duct elements
designs.lighting: Edison bulbs, black metal pendants, track lighting
designs.furniture: Metal frame king bed, leather lounge chair, steel side tables
designs.decor: Vintage industrial art, metal sculptures, distressed textures
designs.prompt_keywords: industrial chic master bedroom, exposed brick, metal accents, raw luxury

designs.name: Japandi Fusion Master Bedroom
designs.description: Calm, balanced space combining Japanese minimalism and Scandinavian warmth
designs.flooring: Light oak or bamboo wood flooring
designs.ceiling: Minimal flat ceiling with wooden beams
designs.furniture: Low platform bed, solid wood side tables, minimalist wardrobe
designs.decor: Indoor plants, ceramic vases, neutral textiles
designs.prompt_keywords: japandi master bedroom, zen minimalism, warm wood tones

designs.name: Maximalist Bold Master Bedroom
designs.description: Expressive, artistic bedroom rich in color, pattern, and personality
designs.flooring: Patterned tiles or plush geometric carpet
designs.furniture: Ornate bed frame, colorful lounge seating
designs.decor: Gallery art wall, layered rugs, sculptural decor
designs.prompt_keywords: maximalist master bedroom, bold colors, artistic luxury

designs.name: Coastal Serene Master Bedroom
designs.description: Relaxing beach-inspired retreat with light textures and airy comfort
designs.furniture: Wooden bed, upholstered armchair, driftwood side tables
designs.decor: Seashell accents, coastal art, linen curtains
designs.prompt_keywords: coastal master bedroom, beach-inspired, light and airy

designs.name: Art Deco Glamour Master Bedroom
designs.flooring: Chevron wooden parquet or black marble
designs.walls: Deep jewel tones with gold detailing
designs.prompt_keywords: art deco master bedroom, glamorous luxury, gold accents

designs.name: Rustic Farmhouse Master Bedroom
designs.description: Warm, cozy country-style bedroom with natural charm
designs.walls: White shiplap or soft earth tones
designs.prompt_keywords: rustic farmhouse master bedroom, warm country style

designs.name: Modern Tech-Smart Master Bedroom
designs.description: Sleek, contemporary bedroom integrated with smart technology
designs.flooring: Polished concrete or smart wood flooring
designs.walls: Matte black and white with smart panels
designs.prompt_keywords: smart master bedroom, modern tech luxury

designs.name: Tropical Paradise Master Bedroom
designs.description: Lush nature-inspired bedroom with resort-style comfort
designs.prompt_keywords: tropical master bedroom, resort style, lush greenery

designs.name: Minimalist Zen Master Bedroom
designs.description: Peaceful, clutter-free bedroom focused on balance and simplicity
designs.prompt_keywords: minimalist zen master bedroom, calm neutral design

designs.name: Gothic Dramatic Master Bedroom
designs.description: Dark, dramatic luxury bedroom with theatrical elegance
designs.prompt_keywords: gothic master bedroom, dark luxury, dramatic elegance
